meanings.definition: relating to the structure of an organism
meanings.sent1: The anatomic features of the flower help attract bees for pollination.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the anatomic details of the human body to understand its functions.
meanings.sent3: The anatomic puzzle pieces fit perfectly together, creating a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent4: Her anatomic knowledge was the key to unlocking the mysteries of the ancient skeleton.
meanings.sent5: The anatomic similarities between different species highlight their evolutionary connections.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the physical structure of an organism
meanings.sent1: The anatomic differences between the two species were easily noticeable.
meanings.sent2: An anatomic study revealed the intricate details of the plant's root system.
meanings.sent3: The anatomic changes in the caterpillar's body during metamorphosis were fascinating.
meanings.sent4: His anatomic understanding of the machine allowed him to repair it efficiently.
meanings.sent5: The anatomic variations in bird beaks showcase their diverse feeding habits.

meanings.sent1: The anatomic textbook provided detailed illustrations of the human body.
meanings.sent2: An anatomic examination helped diagnose the patient's condition accurately.
meanings.sent3: The anatomic chart on the wall made the doctor's office look educational.
meanings.sent4: Her anatomic expertise made her a valuable member of the surgical team.
meanings.sent5: The anatomic drawings in the museum displayed the beauty of internal structures.
